mapper.sql: t.id, t.type, t.title, t.create_user as "createUser.userName", t.create_date as "createDate", t.remote_addr as "remoteAddr", t.user_agent as "userAgent", t.request_uri as "requestUri", t.method, t.params, t.exception, t.spend_time as "spendTime"

sql.where:
1=1
and t.type LIKE '%'||#{type}||'%'
and t.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
and t.create_user LIKE '%'||#{createUser.userName}||'%'
and t.create_date = #{createDate}
and t.remote_addr LIKE '%'||#{remoteAddr}||'%'
and t.user_agent LIKE '%'||#{userAgent}||'%'
and t.request_uri LIKE '%'||#{requestUri}||'%'
and t.method LIKE '%'||#{method}||'%'
and t.params LIKE '%'||#{params}||'%'
and t.exception LIKE '%'||#{exception}||'%'
and t.spend_time LIKE '%'||#{spendTime}||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_LOG ( type, title, create_user, create_date, remote_addr, user_agent, request_uri, method, params, exception, spend_time, id ) VALUES ( #{type}, #{title}, #{createUser.userName}, #{createDate}, #{remoteAddr}, #{userAgent}, #{requestUri}, #{method}, #{params}, #{exception}, #{spendTime}, #{id} )
